notes: Does not share cooldown with Battle Fury or Iron Talon.
Stacks with the Quell of Battle Fury, but not with additional Quelling Blades.
When the owner's attack type changes to ranged or melee, the attack damage bonus adapts immediately.
Quell fully works with crits, cleave, splash, and lifesteal.
When attacking creeps, Quell also causes cleave, splash, Psi Blades, and Moon Glaives to deal more damage to every unit they hit.
Does not work against wards, buildings, illusions, Spirit Bear, and allied units. Works against Roshan.
abilities.description: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 13 for melee heroes, and 6 for ranged.

name: Quelling Blade
description: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.
tips: As its active can chop down trees . It is a perfect escape plan from Sprout.
It also can help escape in the woods by carving own paths and juke.
